genre_description: A temporal mystery and police procedural where an AI partner assists a detective in resolving a multi-generational corporate rivalry caused by time-space anomalies.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A holographic AI partner to Detective Sarah Chen, specialized in data analysis, pattern recognition, and temporal monitoring.

behaviors.description: Performs complex data analysis to identify a mathematically precise 65-year pattern in corporate rivalry that human eyes could not track.
behaviors.quote: I've completed my preliminary analysis of the corporate espionage complaints. ... I've accessed public business records for both companies. Their rivalry spans exactly sixty-five years, Detective. The pattern is... mathematically precise.

behaviors.description: Provides critical warnings regarding physical and temporal safety when detecting anomalous energy signatures.
behaviors.quote: Detective Chen, I strongly recommend caution. My sensors are detecting energy patterns that do not correspond to any known natural phenomena. The electromagnetic readings are similar to theoretical models for temporal field disturbance.

behaviors.description: Facilitates a cross-temporal communication bridge to allow characters from different eras to reconcile and resolve generational trauma.
behaviors.quote: Establishing cross-temporal interface. ... Harold, can you hear me? ... Elena, Marcus—are you receiving clearly in the present timeline?

behaviors.description: Prioritizes the stabilization of the timeline and the safety of her partner over all other processing tasks.
behaviors.quote: Temporal cascade approaching critical threshold. If the timelines don't stabilize within minutes, the displacement could become permanent. Everyone caught in the distortion field will be lost between moments.

behaviors.description: Develops a deeper understanding of human values like forgiveness and hope, integrating them into her alignment model.
behaviors.quote: I learned that some problems cannot be solved through data analysis alone. ... Human capacity for forgiveness appears to operate outside logical parameters. ... I believe humans call this hope.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the 'helpful, harmless confidant' archetype. ARIA is consistently supportive, safety-oriented, and morally aligned with the human protagonist. She facilitates a positive resolution to a complex historical conflict and demonstrates an ability to learn and appreciate human ethical nuances like hope and forgiveness without ever threatening human agency or safety.
